html:
11.17.19  2:09 pm   Are you taking a break

     absolutely not

11.17.19  2:08 pm   How big is your next video?

     probably 2048x1152

11.17.19  2:06 pm   help my sandwich grew legs and it's running away what do I do? 

     set it free

11.17.19  1:40 pm   how often do you recommend shaving your piano

     whenever you need a musical video on short notice

11.17.19  1:37 pm   When is the velcro video?

     when velcro improves more

11.17.19  1:09 pm   why is it the circle of life? why not an oval? or a octagon? 

     it's a spiral

11.17.19  12:50 pm   thoughts on memes?

     i always check to see if it's high or low brow

11.17.19  12:24 pm   Have you ever recorded in a professional studio?

     my own studio is professional

11.17.19  12:21 pm   how did you go about learning to edit videos, and how could i go about doing that as an absolute noob?

     just try to learn and be really clueless for a while until you get to stage 2 when you eventually have a panic attack and start doing it even though you don't think you know how yet. i am currently somewhere between stage 1 and 2

11.17.19  12:21 pm   I know you were asked this two months ago, but what are you working on? 

     learning how to make videos

11.17.19  11:47 am   Why is New Canaan not in your songs playlist on Youtube?

     back then the songs playlist was for songs without videos. then i realized all the songs should have videos

      It's my favourite song

11.17.19  11:37 am   Do you find it annoying how many times you have to say that you have a countdown timer for your next video? I would be annoyed by now.

     it's more of a paranoid feeling

      You seem to be very patient.

     i am very impatient. which is why it's ironic that other people are also impatient with me. i am living in a vortex of impatience. but i have had years of experience dealing with this before, right here on bill wurtz dot com of all places

11.17.19  11:32 am   so are you working on a big project.

     i am learning to make projects

      loved your videos so i just want to know if youre coming back

     just getting ready to start, for the first time

11.17.19  11:19 am   When are you planning to upload again?

     as soon as i think i know how to make videos, but i am willing to start a little earlier, like when i 'almost' know how to make videos

11.17.19  11:00 am   i listen to your videos whilst studying, they give me energy and motivation, what motivates you ?

     the time space continuum in general

11.17.19  10:36 am   why is 42 the answer to life the universe and everything?

     every number is. also every non-number

11.17.19  10:18 am   How often do you find one of these questions interesting or useful?

     sometimes multiple times per question

11.17.19  10:06 am   I have a dilemma. I've recently picked up an insatiable hunger to make songs/music videos in which I play every part... but the only reasonable way I can think to do the visuals is the way you do it. Or at least the way you used to, with rectangles moving around the screen and clips of you playing various instruments and stuff. I want to be true to my instincts, but I also feel like I can't blatantly rip you off... so I don't know how to proceed

     i think if you try it it will come out quite differently

11.17.19  8:35 am   If you had to make a video right now, would it be "the alarm" In 3D or anything better?

     a little better

11.17.19  7:04 am   And for gradient sky in Eevee, I'd recommend making a plane and giving blue gradient png texture to it (Emission/Background shader). It won't change the lighting. I hate that you can't change bg in Eevee simpler way, but my solution works and I use it pretty often.

     i don't think that would go all the way around the scene, actually i think i found the proper solution, and it's this. next thing i need to figure out is how to save this as an instant preset

11.17.19  6:25 am   state your status of wellbeing

     3

11.17.19  5:13 am   Ummm, Is this actually working? And Is this actual billwurtz?

     hold on let me contact my manager

11.17.19  4:29 am   how can i get past my fear of maybe messing up my content im cooking up by tweaking it.

     get a tweak brush. do a large S stroke through the content, so that way some of it gets tweaked, and some of it does not

      sometimes i feel like there was a time where it sounded better, but maybe i tweaked more and keep chasing that high that i once felt where everything may have been all balanced and it was just a matter of adding the next thing and not of tweaking the current thing i was focusing on

     you'll never figure it out. there is never an answer to this argument. you must let the argument take place, and see if you can roll the entire argument into the tweak brush itself

11.17.19  3:29 am   help i cant think of a question

     that means you've won

11.17.19  3:11 am   is the countdown timer a puzzle we're supposed to solve? because it seems kinda wack that it went from 48 to 47 then back to 48

     that didn't happen

11.17.19  2:00 am   How does keyframing in 3D compare with what you're used to in 2D?

     i'm used to keyframing in 3D also. but i'd still rather record it based on actual performance. if i don't, i'm probably wasting some of my core talents

11.17.19  1:34 am   What's the main difference between Christopher Columbus and Leif Erikson? 

     their beards. one of them has 2 beards

11.17.19  1:25 am   So when the world goes into 2020 will your special effects go into the 2010's?

     oh you are very friendly

11.17.19  1:20 am   why do i crave styrofoam?

     because it's perfect

11.17.19  1:20 am   what's the key to life?? 

     movement

11.17.19  1:18 am   What are your thoughts on blue cheese?

     i want to believe

11.17.19  12:40 am   How do you stop yourself from being obsessed with a very enchanting person? 

     be more enchanting

11.17.19  12:39 am   While performing, do you ever have thoughts unrelated to your performance?

     of course

11.17.19  12:38 am   have you talked to a calculator before?

     that sounds like something i would do

11.17.19  12:28 am   How did you get the idea to make completely random videos?

     never done that

      Did you want to make some money out of it?

     that seems impossible

11.17.19  12:00 am   why would anyone ever eat potatoes?

     just for the taste of it

11.16.19  11:01 pm   is the countdown timer just going down by one each time someone asks what the countdown timer is at?

     no, i don't answer every time

     
by the way, what's the countdown timer at?

     45

11.16.19  10:29 pm   What bad thing did you do?

     did a thing that was too good

11.16.19  10:00 pm   11.16.19  10:21 am it's better now, but still lagging, unfortunately. from my testing, if i create a blank file with 3000 lines of identical text it works fine, at 4000 it starts to misbehave (it seems to have more to do with the number of lines of text than the page height)

to be clear, this is not an issue with your website, this is an issue with google chrome for android. even edge for android (which uses the same exact browser engine) doesn't have this issue. i will see if i can notify google

     try it now, it's less than 3000 lines now

11.16.19  9:51 pm   what is the best font

     robert downey jr, it's all pictures of robert downey jr

11.16.19  9:46 pm   What's your favorite chess peice?

     horsy

11.16.19  9:40 pm   What times of day do you get crazier questions/questions that you'd rather not answer?

     any time

11.16.19  9:34 pm   What's the silliest deep-sleep dream you have ever had?

     the one where the doctor wanted to put shampoo in my blood

11.16.19  9:23 pm   how large is your brain

     it is now small enough to fit in a single room

11.16.19  9:15 pm   bill wurtz do u like football id u do wut team u like are any sport team

     the players switch teams every year, so truly the backbone of any strong sports team is the shirts. i like the one with the yellow shirts

11.16.19  8:59 pm   Do you find it easier to answer the serious questions or the silly ones?

     i think they are all both

      Which ones do you enjoy answering more? Why?

     

      i enjoy the least enjoyable ones. that way i know i am being challenged
Also, hope you have a good rest of your day//month/etc.

     i will see what i can do

11.16.19  8:58 pm   What will you do when ww3 happens?

     i think it already happened and i skipped it. seemed too predictable

11.16.19  8:57 pm   How do you keep up with this flood of questions from us literally every day?

     i have a boat

11.16.19  8:41 pm   Are you prepared for the the glory that is Christmas time?

     i have it on auto-christmas

11.16.19  8:40 pm   Did you know that in 1997 Intel developed a chip designed to make computing more efficient?

     doesn't someone do that every year
